find:
<xf:textboxrow name="icon" value="{$navigation}"
				label="{{ phrase('font_awesome_icon') }}"
				explain="{{ phrase('admin_navigation_icon_explain') }}"
				dir="ltr" />
replace:
<xf:if is="$xf.options.cv6ReplaceXF">
	<xf:macro id="cv6_fa_icon::cv6_inputIcon"
				arg-name="icon" 
				arg-value="{$navigation.icon}"
				arg-label="{{ phrase('font_awesome_icon') }}"
		  		arg-target="admin-nav"
			  	arg-placeholder="fa-..."
			  	arg-stylechooser="{{ ['style','rotation'] }}"
			  	arg-explain="{{ phrase('admin_navigation_icon_explain') }}"
			/>	
<xf:else />
	$0
</xf:if>
